entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • flyoutitem shellcontent refreshing only ones. If you click it on it again, it pretty much loads from cache #9224
  • WebAuthenticatorResult should do a UrlDecode on the values when populating Properties #9223
  • .net Maui Workload is not available to install on VS 2022 17.3 Preview 6 installer #9222
  • Button is not adapting to theme changes if IsEnabled is changed #9220
  • MAUI tutorial application won't build for Android emulator #9217
  • MAUI Blazor Virtualize with Images does not render properly #9216
  • FilePicker default directory #9212
  • EvaluateJavaScriptAsync does not work if WebViewRenderer is used #9211
  • Updating to .NET MAUI 6.0.486 clears Preferences to Type Defaults on WinUI #9210
  • ScrollView frozen in iOS when data is loaded async #9209

Closed

  • Unable to debug Android target when adding xUnit test project #9091
  • KERNELBASE.dll, version: 10.0.19041.1826, 0xc000027b. Installed .msix MAUI windows APP ERROR #9203

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify ShellItem Parenting #9221
  • Fix [Android] CollectionView EmptyView SelectionMode=Single on Android #9215
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Bump xunit from 2.4.1 to 2.4.2 #9214
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix crash when opening a `TabbedPage` from a `ContentPage` that is referenced in `Shell` #9213
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨

Merged

  • [X] simpilfy and avoid duplication in conversion #7143
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Fix TextColor for SearchBar and CheckBox on Windows #9121
    area/controls 🎮
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22379.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22403.2 #9185
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #9208
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add public triage information #9136
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • WIP: Context menu support for Windows and MacCatalyst #9174
    do-not-merge, area/desktop 🖥️
  • Add props file that allows us to easily isolate to a single TFM #9195
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
  • Disconnect old handler after setting new handler #8781
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 7
  • [xamlc] fix compiled {OnPlatform} #9205
    area/Xaml </>, 6.0-servicing
  • Tooltip Text support for Views #8864
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, .NET 7
  • [iOS] Expose ApplicationSignificantTimeChange method in lifecycle events #7526
    area/lifecycle 🔁, platform/iOS 🍎, .NET 7
  • Build maui.aar on CI #8943
  • Bump Tizen.UIExtensions.ElmSharp from 0.8.1 to 0.9.0 #9207
  • [foldable] Package reference instead of project reference #6514
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, area/infrastructure 🏗️, control-dualscreen, .NET 7
  • More Source Generators #2501
  • Add AppThemeColor #8839
